entries.name: Potion of Luck
entries.description:
A potion that may make your chances of getting something good a little higher.

FUN FACT: Did you know that 80% of people who gamble quit right before they're about to hit it big?

entries.name: Potion of Unluck
entries.description: You might not want to drink this, however it might be fun to trick a friend into trying.

entries.name: Potion of Nausea
entries.description: A potion that makes you feel sick. It's not very fun, but maybe it's a good way to get rid of unwanted guests.

entries.name: Pet Summoner
entries.description: Summons you a pet... but at what cost...
